thread.section_title: Street Smart Transmission Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Street Smart Transmission | streetsmarttransmission.com
thread.title: Marcus
thread.title_full: Street Smart Transmission reviewed by Marcus

author: Marcus
title: Marcus
text: After deciding to go the route of a reman unit, contacting street smart turned out to be a much better experience than i coulve even expected. They answered all questions i had and made me feel assured i had chosen the right place. Great customer service and unbelievably fast shipping! My 2007 chevy avalanche has never shifted and felt so good!! I feel very confident in my desision to choose street smart transmissions!!
